channel.title: iceberg on OpenTableFormat
channel.description: Recent content in iceberg on OpenTableFormat

item.title: A little bit of Apache Iceberg
item.description: Iceberg is a high-performance format for huge analytic tables. Iceberg brings the reliability and simplicity of SQL tables to big data, while making it possible for engines like Spark, Trino, Flink, Presto, Hive and Impala to safely work with the same tables, at the same time.

item.title: What is Open Table Format
item.description: OpenTableFormat is to object storage what constellation is to stars.

item.title: What's the difference of Iceberg/Hudi/Delta?
